scripts.server: RUST_LOG=info HOST=[::1] PORT=50051 STATSD_HOST= STATSD_PORT= yarn arcas
scripts.gstreamer:brew: brew install gstreamer gst-plugins-base gst-plugins-good gst-plugins-bad gst-plugins-ugly gst-libav gst-rtsp-server gst-editing-service
scripts.gstreamer:debian: apt-get install libgstreamer1.0-dev libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-dev gstreamer1.0-plugins-base gstreamer1.0-plugins-good gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad gstreamer1.0-plugins-ugly gstreamer1.0-libav libgstrtspserver-1.0-dev libges-1.0-dev
